name: Magic chart with auto resizing 02
description:
Resize frame to see what happens ;)


You can:

  • Adjust the position of the bar.
  • Adjust the height of the bar, and the bar height will be scaled as a percentage when the chart size changes.
  • Adjust the width of bars.
  • Add or delete bars.
  • Add or delete reference lines.
  • Rotate the axis text angle.
